Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Waterfront Way, south of a large shopping complex.
Room.LongDescription: The large shopping complex on the north side of the road provides much of the fresh meats and grains to the town. There are also a couple of preservative shops to keep the meat fresh while being stored for long periods of time. Iila runs the preservatives shops on this side of the center. To the north is Iila's Fresh Cooking Herbs shop. Further to the west is her Salts and Preservatives shop.
